src:
投票》台南同框拚場，韓朱尬蔡賴誰人氣高？
03 Nov 2019, 02:51 by CTnews網路投票頻道 ivoting, https://www.facebook.com/wownewnews/


洪秀柱（左六）在台南市東區的競選總部2日成立，總統參選人韓國瑜（佐四）、前黨主席朱立倫（左三）同台力挺。（資料照,莊曜聰攝）



民進黨蔡英文總統、前行政院長賴清德自黨內總統初選後首次合體拚場。（資料照,程炳璋攝）

國民黨黨內大咖，包括總統參選人韓國瑜、前新北市長朱立倫、黨主席吳敦義2日赴台南為參選台南市立委的前主席洪秀柱站台。同一時間，民進黨則有總統蔡英文、前行政院長賴清德自黨內總統初選後首次合體。藍綠陣營相隔5公里拚場。藍軍展現高昂士氣強壓綠地，綠營則高喊團結拚總統勝選、國會過半。
您認為，台南同框拚場，韓朱尬蔡賴，誰的人氣高？
※ ivoting是提供用戶表達個人對議題的意見，投票結果無任何立場與傾向，也不會主動提供給任何政府機關或團體做為立法或修法的依據。如有試圖以任何駭客行為影響正常投票結果，一律依法究辦。
投票開始時間： 2019/11/03 10:47 至 2019/11/04 12:00

韓國瑜和朱立倫
蔡英文和賴清德
不知道/無意見

看結果 總投票數：8066
text:
Vote "Taiwan in the same box, Han Zhuo Cai Lai who is popular?
03 Nov 2019, 02:51 by CTnews online voting channel ivoting, https://www.facebook.com/wownewnews/


Hong Xiuzhu (sixth from left) was established on the 2nd in the Eastern District of Tainan City. The presidential candidate, South Korea Yu (Zuo Si) and former party chairman Zhu Lilun (third from left) were on the same stage. (Photo, photo by Zhuang Yuchong)



The Democratic Progressive Party’s President Tsai Ing-wen and former Executive President Lai Qingde made their first match after the party’s presidential primary election. (Photo, photo by Cheng Bingyan)

The Kuomintang party's big coffee, including the presidential candidate South Korea Yu, the former New Taipei Mayor Zhu Lilun, and the party chairman Wu Dunyi went to Tainan on the 2nd to serve as the former chairman of the Tainan City legislator Hong Xiuzhu platform. At the same time, the Democratic Progressive Party had President Tsai Ing-wen and former Executive Dean Lai Qingde's first match since the party's presidential primary. The blue-green camp is separated by 5 kilometers. The Blue Army showed high morale and strong green space, while the Green Camp shouted for unity and victory in the presidential election and more than half of the Congress.
You think that Tainan is in the same box, Han Zhuyu, Cai Lai, who is popular?
※ ivoting is to provide users with opinions on personal issues. The voting results have no position or inclination, and they will not be offered to any government agency or group as the basis for legislation or amendment. If there is an attempt to influence the normal voting result by any hacking behavior, it will be handled according to law.
Voting start time: 2019/11/03 10:47 to 2019/11/04 12:00

Korean Yu and Zhu Lilun
Cai Ying and Lai Qingde
Don't know / no opinion

See results Total votes: 8066
